constraints.name: degree_bound
constraints.description: 每个节点的度数不超过 n-1（无重边无自环）

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 删除节点时，编号小的边优先变为孤边

constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: 一条边成为孤边当且仅当它的两个端点均已被删除

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 每条边有一个唯一的编号，范围为 1 到 m
